item.title: Discover the most common skin conditions on the Better Skin microsite
item.description: Source: Better Skin Microsite. A recently launched online platform aims to raise public understanding of common skin issues, like eczema and melasma, and their available treatments. Supported by Galderma, a company specializing in skincare treatments, the Better Skin microsite features informative videos about various skin conditions. It also includes brief discussions with medical professionals who address questions regarding potential impacts and treatment choices.
